name: Riven Game Save
summary: An RVN file is a game save file created by Riven, a first-person puzzle adventure game developed by Cyan Worlds. It stores the state of a player's game, including the player's position in the game world, items collected, and the status of puzzles solved. RVN files enable players to resume gameplay from a specific point without having to start over.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
